column1:
NYC CAMPAIGN FINANCE BOARD SEARCHABLE DATABASE - KEY TO  
CONTRIBUTION RESULTS REPORT 
Format = CSV

column4: Office Sought: [1=Mayor; 2=Public Advocate; 3=Comptroller; 4=Borough President; 5=City Council; 6=Undeclared; IS=Independent Spender]
Receipient ID, assigned by the CFB
Campaign Finance Program Classification: [Participant, Non-Participant, Limited Participant, Undetermined]
Committee ID, assigned by the CFB

Schedule: [ABC=Monetary Contributions; D=In-Kind Contributions; G=Transfers In; K=Loans/Liabilities Forgiven; M=Receipt Adjustments; N=Outstanding Liabilities; ICONT=Monetary Contributions; IEXPF=In-Kind (Bill Paid); IDISC=In-Kind (Vendor Discount); IREF=Refund]
Page Number of schedule on which information was reported (paper filings only)
Sequence Number on page of schedule on which information was reported (paper filings only)

Contributor Type: [CAN=Candidate; CORP=Corporation; EMPO=Labor Union; FAM=Candidate's Family; IND=Individual; LLC=Limited Liability Company; OTHR=Other; PART=Partnership; PCOMC=Candidate Committee; PCOMP=Political Action Committee; PCOMZ=Party Committee; SPO=Candidate's Spouse; UNKN=Unknown]
Contributor's Street Number - If  C_CODE = IND, CAN, FAM or SPO, Then field = Blank
Contributor's Street Name - If  C_CODE = IND, CAN, FAM or SPO, Then field = Blank
Contributor's Apartment Number - If  C_CODE = IND, CAN, FAM or SPO, Then field = Blank
Contributor's Borough Code: [K=Brooklyn; M=Manhattan; Q=Queens; S=Staten Island; X=Bronx; Z=Outside New York City]
Contributor's City, Schedule N - Vendor's City
Contributor's State, Schedule N - Vendor's State

Intermediary's Street Number, assigned by candidate 
If C_CODE = IND, CAN, FAM or SPO, Then field = Blank

Intermediary's Street Name  
If C_CODE = IND, CAN, FAM or SPO, Then field = Blank

Intermediary's Apartment Number  
If C_CODE = IND, CAN, FAM or SPO, Then field = Blank

Purpose Code (for Schedule D/In-Kind Contributions): [ADVAN=Advance Repayment; CMAIL=Campaign Mailings; CMISC=Campaign Miscellaneous; CNTRB=Political Contributions; COMPL=Compliance Cost; CONSL=Campaign Consultants; CONSV=Constituent Services; FUNDR=Fundraising; INTER=Interest Expenses; LITER=Campaign Literature; NQUAL=Non Qualified Expenditures; OFFCE=Office Expenses; OTHER=Other; PETIT=Petition Expenses; POLLS=Polling Costs; POSTA=Postage Expenses; PRINT=Printing Expenses; PROFL=Professional Services; RADIO=Radio Ads; RENTO=Office Rent; TVADS=Television Ads; UNKN=Unknown; VOTER=Voter Registration; WAGES=Campaign Workers Salaries]
Exempt Code: [C=Compliance Costs; E=Previous Election Costs; P=Petition Challenges; S=Constituent Services; U=Unknown; Blank = Not Exempt]

column1: Contributions include:  Schedule ABC (Monetary Contributions) + Schedule D (In-Kind Contributions) + Schedule G: Type 1 (Transfers In) + Schedule K:  Type 2 (Forgiven Loans) - Schedule M:  Types 1, 2, and 4 (Receipt Adjustments)
